original_text: Thou shalt therefore obey the voice of the Lord thy God, and do his commandments and his statutes, which I command thee this day.
korean_text: 그런즉 네 하나님 여호와의 말씀을 청종하여 내가 오늘 네게 명령하는 그 명령과 규례를 행할지니라

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt therefore obey the voice of the Lord thy God,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 네 하나님 여호와의 목소리를 청종하고

sentences.original_text: and do his commandments and his statutes,
which I command thee this day.
